channel.title: Questions,
channel.description:
HELP
1. When i walk my character stops and then starts again etc.. It just stops walking in the middle of walking and starts again for every square!! Did i do something or change something? And
2. how do i use items on objects and make it do something!! I found out how to use items on items to make it do something but how do i make it for example a key on a door to teleport you somewhere???
PLEASE HELP ME AND POST ANY SUGGESTIONS OR CODES!!!

item.title: Questions,

item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

  1. it only started doing this when i edited a client but i dont remember what i edited and im not lagging because i have a super fast computer and sometimes when i log out and make a new account it does work

and

  1. what do you mean some of em dont work??
    i want to know how to make one!!!
